text: Clarence Smith, better known as Pinetop Smith or Pine Top Smith (June 11, 1904 - March 15, 1929) was an American boogie-woogie style blues pianist. His hit tune, "Pine Top's Boogie Woogie," featured rhythmic "breaks" that were an essential ingredient of ragtime music. In 1991, he was added to the Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame. ==References== ==Other websites== *Clarence "Pine Top" Smith on redhotjazz.com with .ram files of his vintage recordings *[ All Music article] *Official website of the Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame Category:1904 births Category:1929 deaths Category:Musicians from Alabama Category:African- American musicians Category:American pianists Category:Blues pianists
title: Pinetop Smith
